title: I need 50RP! i drew a sketch of my favourite girl champ!

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body: I need 50 rp please accept my sketch! <3

replies.body: Thanks for this drawing!  I feel if Jinx had a self portrait taken she would make a pose like that, and the hair is very nice.  :D  Some poros may have added the RP to your account.  ^__^
Thank you for the nice compliments and for the RP ! ^-^
